Package jeroquest.gui

Provides the classes and interfaces necessary to create a graphical user interface (GUI) for Jeroquest game.

The main class is JeroquestWindow representing the application window, and the main interface is GraphicalPiece representing any graphic piece on the board.

Author:
Programming Methodology Professors
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GraphicalPiece
    Interface representing any class with an icon image representing a piece
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JeroquestWindow
    Class that represents graphical information by means of a panel and it object Game to show
    MyJLabelCharacter
    Class that models a graphical label of Java with a character associated to it Having the character allows it to show the "life bar" over the icon
    MyKeyboard
    Static class MyKeyboard to have access to the pressed keys in the keyboard from the text console.
    MyPanelBoard
    Class that represents a panel with the elements of the current game: the board, the characters and the current round
